card-character-yue-fei.name: Yue Fei
card-character-yue-fei.title: Loyal Song Officer

quote.text: If civil officials don’t love money and military men don’t fear death, the realm will be at peace.

card-character-yue-fei.rulesTextOverride:
Add Yue Fei Character Card to your hand.
Recruit one :song-foot: in 5 separate cities without :dot: or :star:.
Place Yue Fei in Ezhou or a city adjacent to Ezhou.
Tuck this card.

card-character-qin-hui.name: Qin Hui
card-character-qin-hui.title: Jin Captive

quote.text: Let the South keep to the South, the North to the North.

card-character-qin-hui.rulesTextOverride:
Add Qin Hui, Treacherous Minister* to your hand.
Place one :rebel-foot: in Bianjing.
Place :jin-capital: in Shangjing or Yanjing.
Place Qin Hui in any city with :dot:.
Tuck this card.

card-character-wuzhu.name: Wuzhu
card-character-wuzhu.title: Jin General

quote.text: He drove the Song ruler onto a sea island and, in the end, fixed the Huai as the boundary.

card-character-wuzhu.rulesTextOverride:
Add Wuzhu Character Card to your hand.
Recruit 4 :jin-horse: in any city with :dot:.
Place Wuzhu in any city with :dot:.
Tuck this card.

card-character-talan.name: Talan
card-character-talan.title: Jin General

quote.text: Impulsive to the end, he fell into treason; when the plot failed he fled south—only confirming his dealings with the Song. Alas!

card-character-talan.rulesTextOverride:
Add Talan Character Card to your hand.
Recruit 3 :jin-horse: in any city with :dot:.
Place Talan in any city with :dot:.
Tuck this card.

card-character-liu-yu.name: Liu Yu
card-character-liu-yu.title: Song Official

quote.text: Liu Yu seized the moment for gain; the Jin sought to use him to claim credit—what sense is that?

card-character-liu-yu.rulesTextOverride:
Add Liu Yu Character Card to your hand.
Place :song-capital: in Huaiyang.
Recruit one :song-ship: in 4 separate water-accessible cities without :dot: or :star:.
Place Liu Yu in Chuzhou or a city adjacent to Chuzhou without :star:.
Tuck this card.

card-pack-yue-fei-character.name: Yue Fei Character Card
card-pack-yue-fei-character.rulesTextOverride:
Cannot be played with a * card in hand.
Keep this card when played.
Draw up to a hand of 5 cards.
card-pack-yue-fei-character.playConditionMessage: Cannot be played with a * card in hand.

card-pack-qin-hui-character.name: Qin Hui, Treacherous Minister*
card-pack-qin-hui-character.rulesTextOverride:
Cannot be played with other * cards in hand.
Keep this card when played.
Retrieve a :dagger: card from the discard pile and tuck it in front of any other player.
Draw up to a hand of 5 cards.

quote.text: Insidious as a hidden pit; his schemes were unfathomable.

card-pack-qin-hui-character.playConditionMessage: Cannot be played with other * cards in hand.

card-pack-wuzhu-character.name: Wuzhu Character Card
card-pack-wuzhu-character.rulesTextOverride:
Cannot be played with a * card in hand.
Keep this card when played.
Draw up to a hand of 5 cards.
card-pack-wuzhu-character.playConditionMessage: Cannot be played with a * card in hand.

card-pack-talan-character.name: Talan Character Card
card-pack-talan-character.rulesTextOverride:
Cannot be played with a * card in hand.
Keep this card when played.
Draw up to a hand of 5 cards.
card-pack-talan-character.playConditionMessage: Cannot be played with a * card in hand.

card-pack-liu-yu-character.name: Liu Yu Character Card
card-pack-liu-yu-character.rulesTextOverride:
Cannot be played with a * card in hand.
Keep this card when played.
Draw up to a hand of 5 cards.
card-pack-liu-yu-character.playConditionMessage: Cannot be played with a * card in hand.
